poem:
Title: "Comedy in the Unseen Tragedy"

In the shadow of the quill,
Postmasters accused with no thrill.
A mistake of code, no human will,
Irony strikes this drama's pill.
Jones and Julie in the theatre square,
Perform sorrow that was hardly there.
A banger of a tale, hums the air,
Laughs ensue, a justice unfair.
The issues we miss, are often profound,
In a comical morning's ground.
